data.name: SettingMasterToPetIsSelfText
data.value: Enable to consider skills targetting a pet used by its master as self messages.

data.name: SettingMergeAttackChainsText
data.value: Enable to allow merging chain attacks with previous attacks in the chain.

data.name: SettingFontNameText
data.value: Default font. Must be in the appropriate folder, and must be in .ttf format. Leave it blank to use the default built-in font. A fallback will be used if the given font can't be loaded.

data.name: SettingAutocropIconsText
data.value: Automatically crop icons to remove margins.

data.name: SettingMergeMaxMsStrikesText
data.value: In milliseconds, the oldest a message can be to be considered for merging with a new message. Only applies to strikes (so no damage over time nor heals over time). Set to -1 to disallow this type of merging altogether.

data.name: SettingMultiIconMessagesText
data.value: On messages with multiple skill icons (usually merged attack chains), show all skill icons stacked on top of each other.

data.name: SettingMessageHeightDeltaText
data.value: Modify message height by this value. Negative values make messages smaller so they may overlap one another, while positive values make them bigger, creating some spacing between them.

data.name: SettingMergeMaxMsBuffsText
data.value: In milliseconds, the oldest a message can be to be considered for merging with a new message. Only applies to buffs (so damage over time or heals over time). Set to -1 to disallow this type of merging altogether.

data.name: SettingAutocropToleranceText
data.value: When cropping icons, any pixel closer to the background color than this value will be considered background.

data.name: SettingMinIconMarginText
data.value: When cropping icons, leave this much margin (in icon size relative units).

data.name: SettingPetToMasterIsSelfText
data.value: Enable to consider skills used by a pet tragetting its master as self messages.
